definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: horse, steed (less common synon. of [[סוּס]] ( > explained away by Schwally:ZAW viii (1888). 191); Ar. farasun horse, mare (oft.), so Eth.faras:: cf. Sab. [[פרם]] horse, Mordtm:Him. Inschr. 70);—Pl. [[פָּרָשִׁים]] (erron. for … [[פְּרָשִׁיס]] Kö:ii. 1, 89) Ez Eze 27:14 +, sf. [[פָּרָשָׁיו]] Is 28:28, 1Sa 8:11; —steeds Ez Eze 27:14 ( + [[סוּסִים]], [[פְּרָדִים]]), from Togarmah; sim. of swiftness Joe 2:4 (‖ [[סוּסִים]]); prob. also Is 28:28, Je 46:4 (‖ [[סוּסִים]], cf. Gf Gie), and perhaps ´[[וְשָׂם לוֹ בְּמֶרְכַבְחוֹ וּבָעָרָשָׁיו וְרָחוּ ווו]] 1Sa 8:11 (kg. subj.).
